comment.author: 49786468@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called "Jump off the stage at Kiyomizu", and we'd love to have your photo added to the group.

comment.author: 64818823@N08
comment._content:
Hi there! The correct name should be "Kiyomizu". It's Kiyomizu-dera in Higashiyama (Kyoto).
Thanks for sharing these photos here.
